projects.name: Routing
projects.description: A multi-page React application using an external API and react-router-dom. Users can view the list of users, detailed information about users, photo albums and photos.

projects.name: Lamoda
projects.description: The Lamoda project is an online store with filtering and sorting of products. Filters by substring, color, and category. Sort by price and rating.

projects.name: TODO List
projects.description: Implementation of TODO List with an input field, adding, deleting and filtering tasks, as well as with the ability to sort.

projects.name: Notion
projects.description: A multi-user application for creating and managing notes. Users can create, delete and edit their notes. The Tailwind CSS library is used for styling.
